actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide emergency security assistance authorizations for Israel and Cambodia.

summary.text: Emergency Security Assistance Act - Authorizes an appropriation to the President of $2,200,000,000 for emergency military assistance or foreign military Sales credits to Israel and an appropriation not to exceed $200,000,000 for Cambodia. Authorizes the release of Israel from its liability for articles and services supplied it for the period October 6, 1973 through June 30, 1974.

titles.title: A bill to provide emergency security assistance authorizations for Israel and Cambodia.
